sentence.Network_en: They had to evict some gypsies today and I had to go and fence the area off.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们今天必须驱逐一些吉普赛人，我得去把那个区域圈起来。

sentence.Network_en: They had employed heavies to evict shop squatters from neighbouring sites.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们雇了一些彪形大汉，将附近私自占点的商贩都赶走了。

sentence.Network_en: The landlord will evict him or raise his rent.
sentence.Network_cn: 地主就会收回租地或抬高地租.

list.abs: 联合国译员口译词汇2 - 佐欧伊的日志 -... ... *forced circulation 强制流通［货币］ *forced evictions 强迫迁离 *forecast 预测.
卡波特一家人去年11月1日收到要在今年7月底搬家的驱逐通知（eviction notice）。租客一般有三个月的搬离宽限期，因此卡波特一家 …
eviction是什么意思... ... eviction2.  收回 eviction notice2. 逐出通知 notice of eviction2.  收回房舍通知书.
为新的发展项目让路而对长期居民采取的强行迫迁(forced eviction)已经在很多城市发生过,包括北京、上海和广州。 尽管有胡锦涛和温家宝等中央领导层再三发布的禁令.
His landlord has begun eviction proceedings ., 他的房东已经开始了驱逐程序.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'recover property, or the title to property, by legal process'): from Latin evict- 'overcome, defeated', from the verb evincere, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + vincere 'conquer'

entry.tran: （通常因为违法或毁约而）驱逐，赶出
entry.def: If someone is evicted from the place where they are living, they are forced to leave it, usually because they have broken a law or contract.

example.ex: They were evicted from their apartment after their mother became addicted to drugs...
example.tran: 他们的母亲吸毒上瘾后，他们被从公寓里赶了出来。

example.ex: In the first week, the city police evicted ten families...
example.tran: 在第一周内，该市警方就驱逐了10个家庭。

means.word_mean: 1. expel or eject without recourse to legal process;

sentences.sentence: "The landlord wanted to evict the tenants so he banged on the pipes every morning at 3 a.m."

means.word_mean: 2. expel from one's property or force to move out by a legal process;

sentences.sentence: "The landlord evicted the tenants after they had not paid the rent for four months"

auth_sentence.content: The sheriff will evict you and remove your property.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sheriff will evict you and remove your property.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sheriff will evict you and remove your property.

auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe I'm a loser and they can just evict me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe I'm a loser and they can just evict me.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+vict征服,克服→彻底征服掉[的人]→证明…有罪;囚犯
convict[v.[经审讯]证明…有罪,宣判…有罪 n.囚犯]+ion表名词→n.深信,确信;定罪,判罪
evict[v.[依法]驱逐]+ion表名词→n.逐出, 赶出
vict征服,克服+or人→n.得胜者,胜利者
victor[n.得胜者,胜利者]+y状态→n.胜利
con全部+vict征服,克服→彻底征服掉[的人]→证明…有罪;囚犯
e出+vict征服,克服→征服后把别人赶出去→驱逐

means.word_mean: (依法从房屋里或土地上)驱逐, 赶出

sentences.en: If you don’t pay your rent you’ll be evicted.
sentences.cn: 如果你不交房租, 就会被赶出去。
